prompts: List all available Amazon Redshift clusters in my AWS account.
List all databases in the Redshift cluster named my-redshift-cluster.
List all schemas in the dev database of my-redshift-cluster.
List all tables in the public schema of the dev database in my-redshift-cluster.
List all columns in the users table in the public schema of the dev database in my-redshift-cluster.
Execute the following SQL query on the dev database in my-redshift-cluster: `SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;`
